channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘The Muppet Show’ Special Drops a Gently Kinky Full Trailer
item.description: Sabrina Carpenter brings her own flair to the 50th anniversary celebration of Kermit, Miss Piggy, Gonzo, Fozzie Bear, and company's variety show.

item.title: How to watch Gaelic Football on BBC iPlayer (it's FREE)
item.description: David Attenborough reveals the wild heart of London — here’s how to watch Wild London online and for free from any country as the urban wildlife doc wows TV viewers.

item.title: Casio teased a retro gaming-inspired sampler
item.description: Casio showed up to NAMM (CES for music gear nerds) this year with a prototype sampler called the SX-C1 that looks every bit the lovechild of a Game Boy and an SP-404. The top has a directional pad and four buttons just like you'd find on a game controller, flanking a 1.3-inch OLED screen. But […]

item.title: Microsoft SharePoint exploited to hack multiple energy firms
item.description: Hackers are abusing SharePoint to break into people's emails and propagate further throughout the networks.

item.title: Lowe's launches a huge weekend sale ahead of Presidents' Day — up to 40% off appliances, heaters, tools, furniture, and more
item.description: Lowe's has launched a huge weekend sale ahead of its Presidents' Day event, and I'm rounding up all the best deals that I recommend buying now.

item.title: Meta is temporarily pulling teens' access from its AI chatbot characters
item.description: Meta will no longer allow teens to chat with its AI chatbot characters in their present form. The company announced Friday that it will be "temporarily pausing teens’ access to existing AI characters globally."The pause comes months after Meta added chatbot-focused parental controls following reports that some of Meta's character chatbots had engaged in sexual conversations and other alarming interactions with teens. Reuters reported on an internal Meta policy document that said the chatbots were permitted to have "sensual" conversations with underage users, language Meta later said was "erron...

item.title: The best instant cameras you can buy right now
item.description: Even with the ability to take excellent photos with our phones and instantly share them across the world, there’s something magical about the old-school instant camera. With just a click of a button, you can capture a moment in a photo that you can see and touch almost immediately. Images captured by an instant camera […]

item.title: Le casque Sony Inzone H9 profite des soldes d’hiver pour perdre presque 75 % par rapport à son prix de lancement
item.description: Le Sony Inzone H9 est un casque efficace grâce à un design confortable et à sa réduction de bruit active. À l'occasion des soldes d'hiver 2026, vous pourrez le retrouver chez Micromania-Zing pour 79,99 euros contre 299 euros au moment de son lancement.

item.title: James Gunn Just Dropped Our Best Look Yet at Lobo
item.description: Jason Momoa stars as the iconic character in 'Supergirl,' in theaters June 26.

item.title: Trump Wrecked Climate Policy in a Year. Can We Ever Go Back?
item.description: Trump’s attacks on bedrock environmental and climate laws are inherently fragile—and could reflect the president’s preference for political dominance over lasting change.

item.title: Hang on, there’s a Trump Phone Ultra coming too?
item.description: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it turns out we might have two Trump Phones to worry about. The Trump Phone may be no more […]

item.title: Highguard, the PvP shooter from former Apex Legends and Titanfall creators, is still kicking and seemingly won't be delayed despite radio silence from devs
item.description: Wildlight Entertainment's PvP raid shooter Highguard appears to be alive and well, despite no updates since the game's announcement at The Game Awards last month.

item.title: The Best Use for Smart Glasses Might Have Nothing to Do With Entertainment
item.description: It's not all about getting email notifications plastered on your eyeballs.

item.title: Ingérence, faux sondage, manipulation : l’Arcom rappelle les règles du jeu à Snap, Instagram et X avant les élections municipales
item.description: Les plateformes en ligne comme TikTok, LinkedIn, X doivent aussi respecter certaines règles en période électorale, rappelées ce vendredi 23 janvier par le gendarme du Numérique et de l'Audiovisuel. Équipe de modération, points de contact, coopération... Voici ce qu'il faut en retenir.

item.title: Curl will stop bug bounties program due to avalanche of AI slop
item.description: A small team was being bombarded with submissions, many of which were low-quality, or AI-generated.

item.title: CBP Wants AI-Powered ‘Quantum Sensors’ for Finding Fentanyl in Cars
item.description: US Customs and Border Protection is paying General Dynamics to create prototype “quantum sensors,” to be used with an AI database to detect fentanyl and other narcotics.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : la 3ème démarque continue avec de belles pépites juste avant le week-end
item.description: Cela fait déjà plus de deux semaines que les soldes d'hiver ont commencé en France et que les e-commerçants tels qu'Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount partagent des offres. C'est maintenant l'heure de la 3e démarque et voici les meilleures offres Tech à saisir.

item.title: Google Photos’ latest feature lets you meme yourself
item.description: The new feature lets you insert yourself into a meme in Google Photos.

item.title: Fnac et Darty font le plein d’offres pour le week-end des soldes
item.description: Le week-end approche, et les bonnes affaires continuent ! La 3ᵉ démarque des soldes d’hiver bat son plein chez Fnac et Darty, avec toujours plus d’offres Tech à ne pas manquer. Smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs… les réductions se multiplient.

item.title: Own a PS5? These are the six free games I always have on my console
item.description: You can get plenty out of your console without spending a penny, as proven by these fantastic free PS5 games.

item.title: Save $100 on the 2024 Apple Mac mini with M4 chip
item.description: As of Jan. 23, the Apple Mac mini (M4) is on sale for $499, down from $599, at Amazon. That’s a 17% discount or $100 in savings.

item.title: AMD's Ryzen 9850X3D is out next week – at a price that makes it a seriously tempting CPU for gamers
item.description: AMD reveals Ryzen 9850X3D costs $499, dispelling rumors that gaming champ CPU would be really expensive.

item.title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters ahead of new version
item.description: Meta today said that it is pausing teens' access to its AI characters globally across all its apps. The company mentioned that it is not abandoning its efforts but wants to develop an updated version of AI characters for teens.

item.title: The 3 biggest lies robot vacuum brands are telling us, by a professional tester
item.description: Trying to see clearly through the marketing smoke and mirrors? Here are three big things to remember.

item.title: Inside NBA House, the league’s big bet on wooing European fans
item.description: The NBA built a living lab in London to test how much Europeans love the sport. In the early 1980s, the National Basketball Association (NBA) faced a crisis. Television ratings were plummeting—the 1981 NBA finals were among the lowest of all time. Spurred by failing franchises, low game attendance, and declining corporate sponsorships, the league’s cultural relevance in the United States waned. Then in 1984, the league responded with a structural shift that would change the culture of sports for decades to come. ...

item.title: Ils ont percé le mystère de Jupiter : des grains cosmiques révèlent enfin sa vraie date de naissance
item.description: Homo sapiens constate et rapporte dans ses écrits des chutes de pierres venues du ciel depuis des millénaires, mais leur étude scientifique et la compréhension de leur origine ne datent que d'environ deux siècles, avec des avancées spectaculaires après la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Les météorites...

item.title: Xiaomi met les bouchées doubles ce week-end : les 15 meilleurs deals des soldes
item.description: Xiaomi a l’habitude de brader ses produits toute l’année, mais c’est encore plus flagrant ce week-end avec la 3e démarque des soldes d’hiver : des offres très attractives affluent sur une large sélection d’appareils, y compris les modèles les plus récents.

item.title: Marshall’s new hub connects to multiple Bluetooth speakers without pairing
item.description: Marshall has announced a new music streaming hub called the Heddon that can broadcast to multiple speakers using the Bluetooth Auracast feature that's finally starting to catch on. Similar to Sennheiser's BTA1 TV Transmitter announced earlier this week, the Heddon doesn't require wireless audio devices to go through a pairing process to stream audio, as […]...

item.title: JBL's new portable speakers have 'stem AI' for jamming — they can remove any instrument or vocal from songs in realtime, no internet required
item.description: JBL's BandBox Solo and Trio play songs in the key of AI

item.title: Save $29 on a like-new Kindle — tested, charged, and updated by Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 23, get a like-new Kindle Paperwhite for just $114.99. That saves you $29 off its usual list price for 20% savings.

item.title: No, the Trump T1 phone still hasn't shipped, but it might finally arrive in March
item.description: Trump Mobile's T1 phone is now said to ship in March, if it isn't delayed again.

item.title: LG 55B5 : ce TV OLED abordable de 2025 chute sous les 800 € pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Si vous souhaitez changer de téléviseur, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur avec le LG OLED55B5. Ce TV offre une belle qualité d’image pour regarder confortablement ses contenus favoris avec un prix plus attractif lors des soldes : 799 euros au lieu de 1 199 euros.

item.title: Massive Winter Storm Could Knock Out Power Across the Nation. Here’s How to Prepare
item.description: The Eastern U.S. is bracing for widespread outages this weekend as heavy snow and ice pummel the region.

item.title: Winter Storm Fern 2026: These 2 weather maps track when snow and ice storms are forecast to hit states this weekend
item.description: Millions of Americans are already under an inclement weather warning or state of emergency. Here’s how to follow the nor’easter’s projected path. America is on the cusp of its first major winter storm of the new year. Dubbed Winter Storm Fern, the storm is expected to begin today and last until at least Monday.

item.title: Today only, you can buy the AirPods Pro 3 for less than $200
item.description: If you’re considering gifting the AirPods Pro 3 for Valentine’s Day, now’s a great time to pick them up. Today only, Best Buy is selling the noise-canceling earbuds for $199.99 ($50 off), matching their all-time low. For iPhone owners, nothing else really compares to the AirPods Pro 3. They deliver the best active noise cancellation […]
